OOC: I figured that if you were aiming at Hot Rod in bot the shots would
go over him in car mode. His car mode only comes up like his waist in
bot mode.

::Hot Rod::

He sees the three bots retreat.
"Hot Rod, maximize!"
He transformes back to bot mode.
"Thats right run, you slagin pieces of scrap!"
